tokens.text: defines a spawn rules document structure

title: Spawn Rules Document
description: A Minecraft Bedrock Edition spawn rules definition document. Spawn rules control how, where, and when entities naturally spawn in the world. They define conditions based on biome, height, light level, population density, and other factors.

fields.title: Format Version
fields.description: The format version of this spawn rules file. Use '1.8.0' or later.

fields.title: Spawn Rules
fields.description: The spawn rules definition containing description and conditions.

fields.title: Description
fields.description: Contains the entity's identifier and population control type.

fields.title: Identifier
fields.description: The entity type identifier, e.g., 'minecraft:zombie' or 'custom:my_entity'.

fields.title: Conditions
fields.description: Array of spawn condition sets. Each condition set can have weight, herd, density, height, biome filters, etc.
